text: The 2015–16 season is FK Partizan's 10th season in Serbian SuperLiga. This article shows player statistics and all matches (official and friendly) that the club have and will play during the 2015–16 season. ==Transfers== ===In=== {| class="wikitable" |- !Date !Position !Name !From !Type !Ref. |- | 3 June 2015 | MF | Marko Jevtović | Novi Pazar | Transfer |Jevtović i Trujić prva letnja pojačanja at FK Partizan official website, 5-6-2015 |- | 5 June 2015 | WG | Nikola Trujić | Napredak | Transfer | |- | 14 June 2015 | FW | Valeri Bojinov | Ternana | Free transfer |Partizan potpisao Božinova!
